formula: T(n, k) = number of paths from (0, 0) to (n-k, k) in the directed graph having vertices (i, j) and edges (i, j)-to-(i+1, j) and (i, j)-to-(i, j+1) for i, j >= 0 and edges (i, 2h+i)-to-(i+1, 2h+i+1) for i >= 0, h>=0.
